item.title: PulteGroup Is Down But Not Out—Here’s What Wall Street Missed
item.description: PulteGroup stock is up after reporting its quarterly earnings, challenging a recent Wall Street analyst downgrade spree with better numbers.

item.title: Cleveland-Cliffs Breaks to New Highs on Earnings, More Upside?
item.description: Cleveland-Cliffs just gave investors another reason to stick by it, as a 24% rally after earnings shows why this steelmaker still has room to run.
